titleStmt.title: Londons loue, to the Royal Prince Henrie meeting him on the riuer of Thames, at his returne from Richmonde, with a worthie fleete of her cittizens, on Thursday the last of May, 1610. With a breife reporte of the water fight, and fire workes.
titleStmt.author: Munday, Anthony, 1553-1633.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Edw. Allde, for Nathaniell Fosbrooke, and are to be solde at the west-end of Paules, neere to the Bishop of Londons gate,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.

place.placeName: the west-end of Paules, neere to the Bishop of Londons gate
